price: Enti bisa wͻn sε, wͻn mmͻeε na εyε den anaasε (abͻdeε nkaeε) a Yɛabͻ noa? Yεbͻͻ wͻn firi dɔteε a ɛsɔ twann mu.
arabic: فَٱسۡتَفۡتِهِمۡ أَهُمۡ أَشَدُّ خَلۡقًا أَم مَّنۡ خَلَقۡنَآۚ إِنَّا خَلَقۡنَٰهُم مِّن طِينٖ لَّازِبِۭ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fa-is'taftihim ahum ashaddu khalqan am man khalaqnā innā khalaqnāhum min ṭīnin lāzibin
